featured.text: But Dumas overcame poverty, the lack of formal education, and the hardship of racism to become one of the world’s most popular writers.
Unfortunately, shoes are not always readily available for people living in poverty, 21 shoes that are the right size.

definition.zh_def: 貧困，缺乏足夠的財富或資源以滿足基本生活需求。
definition.en_def: The state of being extremely poor, lacking sufficient financial resources to meet basic living needs.
definition.example: Many organizations work to alleviate poverty around the world.
